property.name: recordTypeNames
property.label: Recordtype API Name
property.description: (Optional) Comma-separated API Name/s for the Record Type/s being filtered

property.name: isActiveFieldName
property.label: IsActive Field Name
property.description: (Optional) Field Name on the target object (eg Product) that determines if the product is active. Can be omitted but must be a Checkbox field or formula if included.

property.name: deployment
property.label: Deployment Name
property.description: Deployment field for the custom metadata config.

property.name: orderBy
property.label: Order By
property.description: Use SOQL Syntax for ordering eg. 'Name ASC'
